[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@rushstack/terminal](./terminal.md) &gt; [ITerminalWriteOptions](./terminal.iterminalwriteoptions.md) &gt; [doNotOverrideSgrCodes](./terminal.iterminalwriteoptions.donotoverridesgrcodes.md)

## ITerminalWriteOptions.doNotOverrideSgrCodes property

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

If set to true, SGR parameters will not be replaced by the terminal standard (i.e. - red for errors, yellow for warnings).

**Signature:**

```typescript
doNotOverrideSgrCodes?: boolean;
```
